casebody.data:
Shapemasters, Inc.
v.
Angelo Accetturo, Wilderness Trail Development Corporation, and Wilderness Trail Holdings, LLC No. 31P16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 9, 2016 Gerald R. McKinney, Attorney at Law, Newland, for Accetturo, Angelo, et al. Paul A. Fanning, Attorney at Law, Winterville, Norman J. Leonard, Attorney at Law, Asheville, J. Harold Seagle, Attorney at Law, Fletcher, for Shapemasters, Inc.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 1st of February 2016 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of June 2016."
